snippet.title: PAC-MAN Championship Edition DX + Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
PAC-MAN Championship Edition DX + will be available as a free title update for players with PAC-MAN Championship Edition DX while other players will be able to download the game on Xbox Live, PlayStation Network, Windows 8, and STEAM.

-Improved leaderboard functionality
-In-game achievements, medals
-Additional DLC packs including mazes, music, and graphics

Exciting modes such as Score Attack, collecting as many points as possible, and Time Trials, clearing out a set number of laps around each maze as fast as possible, will be sure to keep both old and new PAC-MAN fans coming back for more.
